title: Nagpur Soybean, Soyoil, Soymeal Open- October 03, 2019
text:
Nagpur Soybean, Soyoil, Soymeal Open- October 03, 2019

Commodities 30 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 13:50)

© Reuters. Nagpur Soybean, Soyoil, Soymeal Open- October 03, 2019 Nagpur Soybean, Soyoil, Soymeal Open-October 3, 2018 Nagpur, Oct 3 (Reuters) – Barring a fall in cottonseed oil, major edible oil prices today generally ruled flat in the Vidarbha region of Western Maharashtra in the absence of any worthwhile trading activity. Slackness in demand from millers and retailers against adequate stocks mainly pulled cottonseed oil prices down. Good hike in international edible oil prices also affected sentiment, sources said Thursday. ***** VIDARBHA MARKETS OILS * Soyabean, groundnut loose, groundnut refined, sunflower refined, linseed, rapeseed, castor and coconut KP oil ruled steady here in sluggish trading activity. * Traders expect further fall in cottonseed oil here. SOYMEAL * Soymeal prices today ruled steady here but demand was poor. Easy condition in international soymeal prices also affected sentiment. SOYABEAN * Soyabean prices declined in Nagpur Agriculture Produce Marketing Committee (APMC) on poor demand from local crushing plants. Weak trend on NCDEX, easy condition in Madhya Pradesh soyabean prices and no takers to soyabean oil & soymeal also affected sentiment in limited deals. About 100 soyabean bags reported for auction in Nagpur APMC, according to sources. Nagpur soybean prices in rupees/tonne: -----Soybean yellow----- Soybean black Available Previous (Auction price) (Auction price) Market delivery 36,000-38,000 36,000-38,300 (Available price) Market delivery 36,100-38,100 36,100-38,400 (Traders price) Plant delivery 39,600-40,000 40,000-40,300 Soybean yellow arrivals (in 90-kg bags) and prices (in rupees per tonne) in Vidarbha, according to officials of Agriculture Produce Marketing Committee and trade sources. Deliveries Available prices Hinganghat Akola Amravati Khamgaon Wardha Umred Chandrapur Soyabean plant prices at other places in Maharashtra : Adilabad – n.a., Akola – 39,700, Washim – 39,900, Khamgaon – 39,200, Dhulia – 39,600, Hingoli – 39,800, Jalna – 39,500, Nandurbar – 39,900, Latur – 39,900, Nanded – 39,900, Solapur – 39,900, Sangli – 40,000. Sunflower arrivals (in 50-kg bag), Rapeseed (in 40 Kg bag), groundnut and Dhaniya arrivals (in 40 kg bag), linseed arrival (90 kg bag), Dhan arrival (75 kg bag), cotton (100 kg) and prices (in rupees per 100 kilogram) in Nagpur, according to APMC sources: Deliveries Available prices Previous close Sunflower 2,400-2,600 Groundnut 700-900 Linseed 4,300-4,600 Castor 2,850-3,000 Rapeseed 1,520-1,625 7,500-8,000 Dhaniya 5,400-5,800 Bajra Gavarani Corn 2,100-2,300 1,900-2,150 Cotton 4,300-4,600 NAGPUR Today's open Previous close Soyoil refined crushing plant delivery Soyoil solvent crushing plant delivery Cottonseed refined Cottonseed solvent Groundnut oil – loose (10 kg) 1,240 1,240 Groundnut oil refined (15 Litre) 1,830 1,830 Sunflower oil refined (10 kg) Linseed oil (10 kg) Rapeseed oil (for 15 kg) 1,310 1,310 Castor oil (for 15 kg) 1,860 1,860 Coconut KP oil (for 15 kg) 3,060 3,060 AMRAVATI Soyoil refined Soyoil Solvent Cottonseed refined Cottonseed solvent AKOLA Soyoil refined Soyoil Solvent Cottonseed refined oil Cottonseed solvent DHULIA Soyoil refined KHAMGAON Soyoil refined JALNA Soyoil refined NANDED Soyoil refined Soyoil refined prices at other places in Maharashtra : Latur - 750, Khamgaon – 765, Washim – 758, Solapur – 765, Sangli – 767. (Please add 5% Goods and Service Tax on Soyabean and Cotton oil prices. Soyabean and Cottonseed oil - 10 litre) Nagpur soymeal prices in rupees per tonne Today's open Previous Close Soymeal (Nagpur) 36,500-37,000 36,500-37,000 Soymeal prices at other places in Maharashtra : Akola – 37,200, Washim – 37,300, Dhulia – 37,800, Hingoli – 37,700, Jalna – 37,700, Nandurbar – 38,000, Khamgaon – 37,000, Latur – 37,500, Nanded – 38,000, Solapur – 38,100, Dharwad – 38,300, Sangli – 37,500 WEATHER (NAGPUR) Maximum temp. 33.1 degree Celsius, minimum temp. 22.3 degree Celsius Rainfall : Nil FORECAST: Generally cloudy sky with one or two spells of rains or thunder-showers. Maximum and minimum temperature likely to be around 33 degree Celsius and 22 degree Celsius respectively. Note: n.a.--not available (For oils, transport costs are excluded from plant delivery prices, but included in market prices)
